income_messages:
From: m*************0@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-09 13:12:32
SUBJECT:    I sent this letter with a p
   I sent this letter with a prayer so that it reached you with good health, since I myself i am in a very critical state of health, in which I sleep every night, not knowing if I can live until the next day. I'm Mrs Maria Bouchard. And an aging widow suffering from a long Cancer illness. I have some funds that I inherited from my deceased husband, the amount (15.6 million. Dollars). And I needed a very honest and sincere person, an individual or cooperating organization that would use this foundation for the work of humanity,
I want you to take 40% of the total amount of money for personal use. While 60% of the money goes to charity "people on the street and to help the orphanage. I grew up as an orphan, and I have no one, like my family member, just to save the house of God. I do this in order so that God will forgive my sins and take my soul because these diseases have suffered me so much, My late husband made me realize that it is good to remember and shelter the poor  and the needy ones, He saw me that day when he came, to visit the Orphanage home at Canton Zurich Switzerland and asked for my hand in marriage, I have to follow his steps and help the needy,
I do not want a situation where this money will not be used in a Godly way. That is why I make this decision. I'm not afraid of death, so I know where I'm going. I know that I will be in the bosom of the Lord. Exodus 14 VS 14 says that "the lord will fight my case, and I will be silent." I do not need any telephone communication in this regard due to the state of my health and the presence of relatives of my late husband around me, always trying to get this money from me, which my husband left for me. I do not want them to know about this development. With God's help all things are possible.
I found your email address in the personnel department database and decided to contact you. Please, if you can use the tools for the work of humanity, as I said here. To fulfill my late husband and my wish please
Try checking the spam box, because most of these matches sometimes fall in the SPAM folder.
Please reply to me immediately via this my personal email address for security reasons.
Thank you.
Best wishes,
Maria Bouchard  
From: m*************0@gmail.com
To: fz99964@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-10 16:08:13
SUBJECT: Re: I sent this letter with a p
Dear Isaac
Thank you for your response and your willingness to be part of this great
work of God, I do not have any type of charity in mind, all I want and I
wish for is that the money be used to touch the lives of the down trodden
in any society you deem appropriate.
I am sure that the good God that directed me to you will direct you what
best to do with the money and how to touch the lives of the needy to the
glory of God, I will direct you what to do next and how to access the money
as soon as I receive your response, please note that the process may
require your time and resources please do it for God.
Remain blessed
Mrs. Bouchard
From: m*************0@gmail.com
To: fz99964@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-10 16:30:52
SUBJECT: Re: I sent this letter with a p
Dear Isaac,
The amount of money involved is US$15.6 million, this money was the
proceeds from the sales of my late husbands properties and shares, we do
not have any child and I am not a Ghanaian, I met my husband when he came
for greener pastures in my home country Switzerland, all we worked for was
used to train my late husbands relatives and we were all happy, as soon as
my husband died, they all turned against me and wanted to kill me also to
take over everything we laboured for.
I managed to sell the ones I could lay my hands on and kept the money away
in a security company in Ghana with the help of our family lawyer before
departing to my home country since my late husbands relatives do not want
me alive, I took ill after one of the reconciliatory meetings called by
some elders and that is what I am still suffering from till date.
The lawyer in Ghana will direct you how to go about the release of the
money since my days are numbered, my main aim is to hand you over
everything before I join my great and wonderful husband.
Remain blessed
Mrs. Bouchard

on earth are numbered because of my health condition.
I will send a message to the lawyer now informing him about you, as soon as
I receive his response I will send you his contact information.
Thank you once more and remain blessed
Mrs. Bouchard

conversations.body:
I sent this letter with a prayer so that it reached you with good health, since I myself i am in a very critical state of health, in which I sleep every night, not knowing if I can live until the next day. I'm Mrs Maria Bouchard. And an aging widow suffering from a long Cancer illness. I have some funds that I inherited from my deceased husband, the amount (15.6 million. Dollars). And I needed a very honest and sincere person, an individual or cooperating organization that would use this foundation for the work of humanity,

I grew up as an orphan, and I have no one, like my family member, just to save the house of God. I do this in order so that God will forgive my sins and take my soul because these diseases have suffered me so much, My late husband made me realize that it is good to remember and shelter the poor  and the needy ones, He saw me that day when he came, to visit the Orphanage home at Canton Zurich Switzerland and asked for my hand in marriage, I have to follow his steps and help the needy,
I do not want a situation where this money will not be used in a Godly way. That is why I make this decision. I'm not afraid of death, so I know where I'm going. I know that I will be in the bosom of the Lord. Exodus 14 VS 14 says that "the lord will fight my case, and I will be silent." I do not need any telephone communication in this regard due to the state of my health and the presence of relatives of my late husband around me, always trying to get this money from me, which my husband left for me. I do not want them to know about this development. With God's help all things are possible.
I found your email address in the personnel department database and decided to contact you. Please, if you can use the tools for the work of humanity, as I said here. To fulfill my late husband and my wish please
Try checking the spam box, because most of these matches sometimes fall in the SPAM folder.
Please reply to me immediately via this my personal email address for security reasons.

Maria Bouchard
